data.name: confirm.removerow

data.name: error.maxtier.reached

data.name: error.minpurch.unmatch
data.value: The units/currency setting must match for all tiers. Tiers defined by currency amounts must use the same currency for all tiers

data.name: error.amount.nan
data.value: Invalid amount value. Values must be numbers

data.name: error.amount.range
data.value: Invalid amount value. Values must be greater than zero.

data.name: error.customer.select
data.value: Please select at least one customer from the list

data.name: error.customer.ss.exists
data.value: Customer Saved Search already exists in the sublist

data.name: error.discount.item
data.value: You have selected an item that is not a Product Item or Service Item in your selection. Please remove it to continue saving this setting.

data.name: error.elig.order.item
data.value: You have selected an item that is not a Product Item or Service Item in your selection. Please remove it to continue saving this setting.

data.name: error.form.locked
data.value: This form is locked by the Advanced Promotions SuiteApp and cannot be edited.

data.name: error.discount.nan
data.value: Invalid Discount Up To value. Values must be numbers

data.name: error.limit.nan
data.value: Invalid Limit value. Values must be numbers

data.name: error.limit.range
data.value: Invalid Limit value. Values must be numbers from 1 to 99,999,999,999

data.name: error.minpurch.enter
data.value: Please enter value(s) for: Minimum Purchase

data.name: error.minpurch.nan
data.value: Invalid Minimum Purchase value. Values must be numbers.

data.name: error.minpurch.range
data.value: Invalid Minimum Purchase value. Values must be between 0 to 100,000,000,000

data.name: error.offer.enter
data.value: Please enter value(s) for: Promotional Offer

data.name: error.offer.nan
data.value: Invalid Promotional Offer value. Values must be numbers

data.name: error.offer.range
data.value: Invalid Promotional Offer value. Values must be greater than zero.

data.name: error.offer.range.percent
data.value: Invalid Promotional Offer value. Values must be greater than zero and must not exceed 100.

data.name: error.percent.nan
data.value: Invalid percent value. Values must be numbers

data.name: error.percent.range
data.value: Invalid percent value. Values must be greater than zero and must not exceed 100.

data.name: error.shipping.select
data.value: Please select at least one method from the list

data.name: error.create.promotion.standard
data.value: You cannot use an Advanced Promotions form after selecting Standard Promotion on the previous page. If you want to create an advanced promotion, go to Lists > Marketing > Promotions > New >, and select an advanced promotion type.

data.name: help.form.buyx.criteria
data.value:
Choose one of the following:

  • Set Order Total - to set order criteria based on the order total or on the total number of units purchased.
  • Select Items - to set criteria based on specific items.
  • Select Item Saved Search - to add criteria for the items in an existing item saved search to the list.
  • Create New Item Search - to create a new item saved search to add to the list

Note: You can only choose public searches for criteria.

data.name: help.form.discount.gety
data.value:
Select one of the following to set the promotional discount:

  • Select Items - Select the items you are offering a discount on. Click Add Another to select additional items.
  • Select Item Saved Search - Choose an existing item saved search that includes the items you are offering a discount on.
  • Create New Saved Search - Create an item saved search that includes the items you are offering a discount on.

Note: You can only include public saved searches to define discounts.

data.name: help.form.discount.item
data.value:
Choose the item you are offering a discount on in one of the following ways:

  • Select Items - Select the items you want to offer a discount on. Click Add Another to select additional items.
  • Select Saved Search - Choose an existing item saved search that includes the items you are offering a discount on.
  • Create New Saved Search - Create an item saved search that includes the items you are offering a discount on.
You can only choose public searches to define discounts.

data.name: help.form.discount.order
data.value: Select New Order Discount to add an order discount to this promotion.

data.name: help.form.discount.shipping
data.value:
Select New Shipping Discount to offer discounted shipping for this promotion.

Select New Item Specific Free Shipping to offer free shipping for specific items for this promotion.

Note: If same shipping method is selected in Shipping Discount and Item Specific Free Shipping, free shipping will only apply to specific items selected while discounted shipping will apply to other items.

data.name: help.form.eligible.apply
data.value:
Select one of the following:

  • If customer matches any criterion Select this option if a customer must be included in only one of the searches or lists you add below to be eligible.
  • If customer matches all criteria Select this option if a customer must be included in all of the searches and lists you add below to be eligible for this promotion.

data.name: help.form.eligible.order
data.value:
Select one of the following:

  • If order matches any criterion Select this option if an order must only meet one of the criteria you add below in order to be eligible.
  • If order matches all criteria Select this option if the promotion is eligible if all of the item criteria you list below are met. Select this option if a customer must be included in all of the searches and lists you add below to be eligible for this promotion.

data.name: help.form.eligible.save.search
data.value:
Choose one of the following:

  • Select Customers - to select specific customers to add to the eligibility subtab.
  • Select Customer Saved Search - to add an existing customer saved search to the list.
  • Create New Customer Search - to create a new customer saved search to add to the list.
Note: Since these customers are defined by saved search criteria, the list of eligible customers can change.

data.name: help.form.include.children
data.value: This box is checked if the discount item you selected is applied to child subsidiaries. You cannot edit this field.

data.name: help.form.order.criteria
data.value:
Choose one of the following:

  • Set Order Total - to set order criteria based on the order total or on the total number of units purchased.
  • Select Items - to set criteria based on specific items.
  • Select Item Saved Search - to add criteria for the items in an existing item saved search to the list.
  • Create New Item Search - to create a new item saved search to add to the list.
Note: You can only choose public searches for criteria.

data.name: help.form.order.criteria.apply
data.value:
Select one of the following:

  • If order matches any criterion – Select this option if an order must only meet one of the criteria you add below in order to be eligible.
  • If order matches all criteria – Select this option if the promotion is eligible if all of the item criteria you list below are met. Select this option if a customer must be included in all of the searches and lists you add below to be eligible for this promotion.

data.name: help.popup.isfs.item
data.value: Select one or more items for free shipping.

data.name: help.popup.addcustomer.customer
data.value: Select the customers who are eligible to use this promotion. To select more than one customer, press and hold CTRL as you make your selections.

data.name: help.popup.addcustomerss.description
data.value: The description for the saved search is shown here.

data.name: help.popup.addcustomerss.eligiblesearch
data.value: Select the customer saved search you want to use to define which customers are eligible for this promotion. Only public saved searches can be used for criteria.

data.name: help.popup.customer.description
data.value: The description for the saved search is shown here.

data.name: help.popup.discount.item
data.value:
Select an item you want to discount with this promotion.

To add additional items to discount, click Add Another.

data.name: help.popup.discount.item.ss
data.value: Choose an existing item saved search that includes the items you are offering a discount on.

data.name: help.popup.discount.limit
data.value:
Enter the maximum number (units) of items you are offering the discount on.

This maximum discount amount takes precedence over the calculated discount amount. If you use the Multiple Currencies feature, you can enter the maximum discount in any currency you do business in.

data.name: help.popup.discount.limit.short
data.value: Enter the maximum number (units) of items you are offering the discount on.

data.name: help.popup.discount.promo
data.value: Enter the discount amount or percentage for the items you selected. Click Add Another if you want to enter a maximum discount amount in additional currencies..

data.name: help.popup.discount.shipping
data.value:
Either enter the discounted shipping amount or enter a discount percentage.

If you enter a currency amount, this is used as the shipping amount. If you enter a percentage, the shipping amount from the shipping method is discounted by this percentage.

data.name: help.popup.discount.shipping.method
data.value: Select the shipping methods you are applying this discount to. If you enter a percentage discount, the shipping methods you select are discounted by that percentage. If you enter a currency amount, this amount is used as the shipping amount

data.name: help.popup.discount.upto
data.value: Enter the maximum discount amount available through this promotion.

data.name: help.popup.offer.discount.max.amount
data.value: Enter the maximum discount amount available for this promotion for a single order.

data.name: help.popup.offer.percent
data.value: Enter the percentage or currency amount discount for this promotion.

data.name: help.popup.order.item.select
data.value: Select an item you want to discount with this promotion.

data.name: help.popup.order.item.ss
data.value: Select the item saved search you want to use to define the order criteria for this promotion. Saved searches used for criteria must be public searches.

data.name: help.popup.order.minimum.purchase
data.value: Enter the minimum purchase amount required for an order to be eligible for this promotion.

data.name: help.popup.order.minimum.purchase.item
data.value: Enter the minimum purchase for these items required for an order to be eligible for this promotion.

data.name: help.popup.shipping.discount
data.value:
Either enter the discounted shipping amount or enter a discount percentage.

If you enter a currency amount, this is used as the shipping amount. If you enter a percentage, the shipping amount from the shipping method is discounted by this percentage.

data.name: help.popup.shipping.method
data.value: Select the shipping methods you are applying this discount to. If you enter a percentage discount, the shipping methods you select are discounted by that percentage. If you enter a currency amount, this amount is used as the shipping amount

data.name: label.discount.upto.total
data.value: Up to a Total Discount Of

data.name: label.order.discount.new.long
data.value: New Order Discount (% or Amount Off)

data.name: label.shipping.applycart
data.value: Shipping Applicable to All Items in the CART

data.name: label.isfs.applycart
data.value: Free shipping applied to specific items in the CART.

data.name: error.item.freeship.select
data.value: Please select at least one inventory or assembly item from the list.

data.name: error.shipping.freeship.select
data.value: Please select at least one shipping method from the list.

data.name: error.item
data.value: Please select at least one item from the list

data.name: confirm.eligibility.edit
data.value: Changing the eligibility criteria will remove all discount settings. Do you want to continue?

data.name: error.currency.limit
data.value: You have selected limit currencies not found in your Eligibility settings. Please remove them to continue saving this setting.

data.name: error.currency.promo
data.value: You have used currencies that you did not use to define eligibility for this promotion. Tiered promotion discounts must use the same currencies used to define the eligibility for this promotion.

data.name: error.promo.offer
data.value: You can only set the limit to units for currency-based promo offers. Please change either the promo offer or limit to continue saving this setting.

data.name: error.create.tiers
data.value: Eligibility and/or discount rules are already defined for this promotion. Please remove all rules to update this field.

data.name: error.discount.limit
data.value: Please input values for all selected currencies to continue saving this setting. If you do not wish to set a limit for this promo offer, click the Limit radio button.

data.name: error.not.incremental
data.value: Tier values must be in increasing order.

data.name: error.equal.values.unit
data.value: You have tiers with matching values. Each tier must have a unique value.

data.name: error.equal.values.currency
data.value: You have tiers with matching values for the same currency. Each tier for a given currency must have a unique amount.

data.name: error.elig.limitcurr.mismatch
data.value: Every discount tier must include a setting for each currency you have used to define eligibility. Please add settings for the currencies you have not included in your discount tiers.

data.name: error.elig.promooffer.mismatch
data.value: Every discount tier must include a setting for each currency you have used to define eligibility. Please add settings for the currencies you have not included in your discount tiers.

data.name: error.item.freeship.invalid
data.value: Free item shipping only applies to inventory and assembly items. Remove non-inventory and non-assembly items to continue.

data.name: label.shipping.item.search.free.new
data.value: Select Item Saved Search for Free Shipping

data.name: help.popup.discount.item.ssisfs
data.value: Choose an existing item saved search that includes the items you are offering a free shipping.

data.name: label.shipping.item.search.free.edit
data.value: Edit Item Saved Search for Free Shipping

data.name: error.shipping.freeship.select_ss
data.value: Select at least one saved search from the list to continue.

data.name: error.item.freeship.noselection
data.value: Please select value(s) for: Item, Shipping Method.

data.name: error.item.freeship.noselection_ss
data.value: Please select value(s) for: Item Saved Search, Shipping Method.

data.name: label.discount.on.highest
data.value: Apply Discount to Highest Valued Item

data.name: help.discount.on.highest
data.value: Check this box to apply discounts to the most expensive item on an order. Clear the box to apply discounts to the least expensive item on an order. Note: This check box only affects promotions with defined unit limits. To define a unit or set a limit, select a limit when selecting items on the promotion.

data.name: text.discount.on.highest
data.value: Apply Discount to Highest Valued Item
